column3: can we get some score synchronization? (#1) 2048 and 2048 pro should sync scores when installed on the same device. users who purchase pro will expect this, and it's easy to do. (#2) score synchronization between devices would be even better. maybe you can use google play games for this?
Love this game! I am always trying to beat at least my last score. It is such an addicting puzzle.
Colors Hands down best version of 2048, because it is so colourful.
